overview.description: Phase 8 applies the frontend design skill principles to optimize the admin interface with a distinctive Twitter-inspired theme. Focus on typography, motion, spatial composition, and visual details while avoiding generic AI aesthetics.
goals: Apply Twitter color theme with OKLCH color system
Replace generic fonts (Inter) with distinctive typography (Open Sans, Georgia)
Enhance spatial composition and visual hierarchy
Apply consistent theming across all admin components

userStories.title: Apply Twitter Theme to globals.css
userStories.description: Replace the current color scheme with the Twitter-inspired theme using OKLCH color values. The theme features a primary blue (#1D9BF0), clean whites, and refined dark mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Update :root with Twitter light theme colors (OKLCH format)
Update .dark with Twitter dark theme colors (pure black background)
Set font-sans to 'Open Sans' instead of Inter
Set font-serif to Georgia and font-mono to Menlo
Increase border radius to 1.3rem for rounded aesthetic
Update shadow values for subtle depth
All CSS variables properly mapped in @theme inline

userStories.title: Enhance Typography System
userStories.description: Establish a distinctive typography hierarchy that avoids generic fonts. Use Open Sans for UI text, Georgia for editorial content, and Menlo for code/technical details.
acceptanceCriteria: Add font-face declarations or Google Fonts import for Open Sans
Update font stack to prioritize distinctive fonts over system defaults
Add tracking and line-height improvements for readability
Ensure proper font weights (400, 600, 700) are available
Test typography in both light and dark themes

userStories.title: Add Motion Animations
userStories.description: Implement CSS animations for page transitions, hover states, and micro-interactions. Focus on high-impact moments like page load and button interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: Add staggered fade-in animations for list items (0.05s delay increments)
Add scale/hover effects to buttons and cards
Implement smooth theme transition (0.3s ease)
Add slide-in animation for toasts and modals
Add pulse effect for loading states
All animations use CSS-only (no JS required)

userStories.title: Enhance Spatial Composition
userStories.description: Improve spacing, padding, and visual hierarchy throughout the admin interface. Use generous negative space and consistent spacing scales.
acceptanceCriteria: Add consistent padding scale (4px, 8px, 16px, 24px, 32px)
Improve card spacing and shadow depth
Add subtle borders with proper border colors from theme
Enhance button spacing and sizing
Improve table row spacing and hover states
Add visual separators between content sections

userStories.title: Update AdminHeader Component
userStories.description: Apply the new Twitter theme to the AdminHeader component with improved typography, spacing, and hover states.
acceptanceCriteria: Apply Twitter primary color to logo/brand elements
Add hover effects to navigation items
Improve spacing between header elements
Ensure theme toggle uses proper colors
Add subtle shadow to header
Test in both light and dark modes

userStories.title: Update ProductForm Component
userStories.description: Refine the ProductForm component with the new theme, focusing on form field styling, button hierarchy, and visual feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Style form inputs with proper border colors and focus states
Apply Twitter primary color to submit buttons
Add hover and active states to all buttons
Improve form field spacing and labels
Add visual feedback for validation states
Ensure image upload area has proper styling

userStories.title: Update ProductVariants Component
userStories.description: Apply the Twitter theme to ProductVariants with improved table styling, row hover states, and action buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Style variant table with proper borders and spacing
Add hover states to table rows
Style edit/delete buttons with appropriate colors
Improve inline editing appearance
Add subtle shadows to variant cards on mobile
Ensure proper contrast in both themes

userStories.title: Verify Cross-Theme Consistency
userStories.description: Test all admin pages in both light and dark themes to ensure consistent styling, proper contrast, and smooth transitions.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigate through all admin pages in light mode
Toggle to dark mode and verify all pages update correctly
Check contrast ratios meet accessibility standards
Ensure theme transition is smooth (0.3s ease)
Verify no color flashes during theme switch
Test on mobile responsive views
